thread.title: BRIEF-National Energy Services Reunited Enters Forward Purchase Agreement With Mea Energy Investment Company 2

title: BRIEF-National Energy Services Reunited Enters Forward Purchase Agreement With Mea Energy Investment Company 2

organizations.name: brief-national energy services reunited enters forward purchas
reuters) - national energy services reunited corp

text:
April 30 (Reuters) - National Energy Services Reunited Corp :
* NATIONAL ENERGY SERVICES REUNITED -ENTERED FORWARD PURCHASE AGREEMENT WITH MEA ENERGY INVESTMENT COMPANY 2, RELATED WITH GULF ENERGY SAOC & NPS DEALS
* NATIONAL ENERGY SERVICES REUNITED - AGREED TO SELL SHARES FOR UP TO $150 MILLION AT CLOSING OF BUSINESS COMBINATION, TO MEA ENERGY INVESTMENT COMPANY 2 Source text for Eikon: ( bit.ly/2FvXR7R ) Further company coverage:
